amendment.description: Amendment repeals the authority to indefinitely charge tolls on existing highway lanes, replacing it with language that allows tolls only on new voluntary-use lanes, with revenues dedicated to new highway capacity.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in House Report 108-456 to strike the authority provided in the bill to implement new tolls on existing highway lanes, and to continue charging tolls indefinitely. The amendment replacesthat authority with language that permits tolls only on new voluntary-use lanes, but when the new lane is paid for, the toll would end.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kennedy (MN) amendment (A022) Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 193 (Roll no. 111).
